meanings.sent1: After the camping trip, we need to reequip our backpacks for the next adventure.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic is reequipping the car with new tires.
meanings.sent3: I forgot to reequip my phone with a charger, so now it's dead.
meanings.sent4: She reequipped her toolbox with shiny new tools, ready for any project.
meanings.sent5: The knight reequipped his armor before heading into battle, ensuring his safety.

meanings.definition: The act of providing with new or different equipment.
meanings.sent1: The reequipping of the office with modern computers boosted productivity.
meanings.sent2: The reequipping of the kitchen with new appliances made cooking easier.
meanings.sent3: The reequipping of the playground with colorful swings brought joy to the children.
meanings.sent4: The reequipping of the gym with state-of-the-art machines attracted more members.
meanings.sent5: The reequipping of the spaceship with advanced technology ensured a successful mission.
